publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3557.1 Christina McKelvie: Keep the Post Public—As an amendment to motion (S3M-3557) in the name of Cathy Peattie, insert at end "and therefore condemns the UK Labour government for its intention to privatise the Royal Mail". Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-3557.1 Christina McKelvie: Keep the Post Public—As an amendment to motion (S3M-3557) in the name of Cathy Peattie, insert at end "and therefore condemns the UK Labour government for its intention to privatise the Royal Mail". Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
